descriptionHtml:
[i][size=3]Turn off Antialiasing, Anisotropic Filtering, FXAA and brightness
Install:
1.Download ENBSeries v0.315;
2.Copy d3d9.dll and enbhost.exe from the wrapper folder to your Skyrim folder;
3.Download and extract my files to your Skyrim folder (not data folder)[i][size=3];[/size][/i]
4. Enjoy.

[i][size=3][u]Recommended system requirements[/u] :
[u]Ram : 8 gb[/u];
[u]CPU : amd fx 8320/intel i5 3470[/u];
[u]GPU : r9 380/gtx 960[/u];[/size][/i]
[/size][/i]
author: Amar124
